item.title: General
item.author: bakerst221b.uk@gmail.com (Veronica)
item.description:
*In these notes common things about deceit, lies and how to spot something. *

Deceit types

  1. Plain lie
  2. Omission
  3. Implication

The main thing is congruence: you sad - you act sad. If anything gives away happiness, there might be a lie going on.
